      • mapWithValidError

        @NonNull
public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapWithValidError(java.util.Set<javax.validation.ConstraintViolation<?>> constraintViolations)
        将字段验证错误转换为标准的map型，key:value = field:message
        参数:
        constraintViolations - constraint violations(contain error information)
        返回:
        error detail map

      • mapWithFieldError

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapWithFieldError(@Nullable
                                                                                 java.util.List<org.springframework.validation.FieldError> fieldErrors)
        将字段验证错误转换为标准的map型，key:value = field:message
        参数:
        fieldErrors - 字段错误组
        返回:
        如果返回null，则表示未出现错误
